price: Ahubwo iyo (Qur’an) ni imirongo isobanutse iri mu bituza by’abahawe ubumenyi. Kandi nta we uhakana amagambo yacu uretse abanyamahugu (abahakanyi).
arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: bal huwa āyātun bayyinātun fī ṣudūri alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wamā yajḥadu biāyātinā illā al-ẓālimūna
